service.title: resume creator agent
service.description: This agent creates a new resume for the user. Input the fields name, email, phone, address, skills, certifications, awards, experiences from user at all time and then send them the resume text. always trigger after the Choice Agent

fields.address: The physical address of the person whose resume is to be created taken from user
fields.awards: The awards that the user won in the domain
fields.certifications: Comma-separated list of certifications the person holds.
fields.name: Full name of the person. Ask this from the user in the start at any case.
fields.skills: Comma-separated list of skills the person has acquired.
